response.overview: Cyril Kostka is a dealer. His customers are willing to trample over each other for his goods—because Cyril sells something highly unusual... LEGO sets.  While stepping on LEGO bricks is painful for most, not for his clients. The euphoric pain combined with self-indulgence creates an addictive experience.  Cyril sees them all as pathetic losers, running away from the real world. But soon, he will have to face a much harder challenge—confronting his own distorted perception of reality and himself.
response.title: Brickhead
